mapper.insert: INSERT INTO card ( card_number, expiration_date, cvc, card_password, created_at, custom_image_url, card_product_id, member_id, is_valid ) VALUES ( #{cardNumber}, #{expirationDate}, #{cvc}, #{cardPassword}, #{createdAt}, #{customImageUrl}, #{cardProductId}, #{memberId}, #{isValid} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM card WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND is_valid = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC
